00058 class OSIMSIMULATION_API AbstractActuator : public Object
00059 {
00060 
00061 //=============================================================================
00062 // DATA
00063 //=============================================================================
00064 public:
00065     static const double LARGE;
00066 protected:
00068     Model *_model;
00069 
00071     bool _appliesForce;
00072 
00074     double _force;
00075 
00077     double _speed;

00080     Array<double*> _x;
00082     Array<double*> _y;

00100     virtual ~AbstractActuator();

00103     static void deleteActuator(AbstractActuator* aActuator) { if (aActuator) delete aActuator; }

00119     void setNumControls(int aNumControls);

00123     void bindState(int aIndex,double &y,const std::string &aSuffix);
00124     void bindPseudoState(int aIndex,double &yp,const std::string &aSuffix);
00125 public:
00126     virtual void setup(Model *aModel);
00127     // MODEL
00128     void setModel(Model *aModel) { _model = aModel; }
00129     Model* getModel() const { return _model; }
00130     // CONTROLS
00131     virtual int getNumControls() const { return _x.getSize(); }
00132     virtual const std::string getControlName(int aIndex) const;
00133     virtual int getControlIndex(const std::string &aName) const;
00134     virtual void setControl(int aIndex,double aValue);
00135     virtual void setControls(const double aX[]);
00136     virtual double getControl(int aIndex) const;
00137     virtual void getControls(double rX[]) const;
00138     // STATES
00139     virtual int getNumStates() const { return _y.getSize(); }
00140     virtual const std::string getStateName(int aIndex) const;
00141     virtual int getStateIndex(const std::string &aName) const;
00142     virtual void setState(int aIndex,double aValue);
00143     virtual void setStates(const double aY[]);
00144     virtual double getState(int aIndex) const;
00145     virtual void getStates(double rY[]) const;
00146     // PSEUDOSTATES
00147     virtual int getNumPseudoStates() const { return _yp.getSize(); }
00148     virtual const std::string getPseudoStateName(int aIndex) const;
00149     virtual int getPseudoStateIndex(const std::string &aName) const;
00150     virtual void setPseudoState(int aIndex,double aValue);
00151     virtual void setPseudoStates(const double aY[]);
00152     virtual double getPseudoState(int aIndex) const;
00153     virtual void getPseudoStates(double rY[]) const;
00154     // Visible Object Support
00155     virtual VisibleObject* getDisplayer() const { return NULL; }
00156     virtual void updateDisplayer() { }
00157     virtual void replacePropertyFunction(Function* aOldFunction, Function* aNewFunction);
00158     OPENSIM_DECLARE_DERIVED(AbstractActuator, Object);
00159 
00160 protected:
00161     // FORCE
00162     void setAppliesForce(bool aTrueFalse) { _appliesForce = aTrueFalse; }
00163     // Update the geometry attached to the actuator. Use inertial frame.
00164     virtual void updateGeometry();
00165 
00166 public:
00167     bool getAppliesForce() const { return _appliesForce; }
00168     virtual void setForce(double aForce) { _force = aForce; }
00169     virtual double getForce() const { return _force; }
00170     virtual double getSpeed() const { return _speed; }
00171     virtual double getPower() const { return _force*_speed; }
00172     virtual double getStress() const;
00173     virtual double getOptimalForce() const;
00174 
00175     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------

00179     virtual void computeActuation() = 0;
00180     virtual void computeStateDerivatives(double rDYDT[]) { }
00181     virtual void computeEquilibrium() { }
00182     virtual void updatePseudoStates() { }
00183 
00184     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00185     // APPLICATION
00186     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00187     virtual void apply() = 0;
00188 
00189     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00190     // CHECK
00191     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00192     virtual bool check() const { return true; }
00193 
00194     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00195     // SCALING
00196     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00197     virtual void preScale(const ScaleSet& aScaleSet) { }
00198     virtual void scale(const ScaleSet& aScaleSet) { }
00199     virtual void postScale(const ScaleSet& aScaleSet) { }
